body.name: Bentley S Series 4-in-1 Convertible Baby Crib, White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 11 mins
features: Any Mattress used in this crib should be at least 27 ¼” by 51 5/8”, with a thickness not exceeding 6” | Mattress not included
Crib assembled dimensions – 34.25” D x 54.25” W x 42.25” H | Floor to Mattress Support base at the 3 positions (Lowest to Highest) – 9.5” / 13.25” / 17”
Strong and sturdy wood construction helps create a dream nursery where you will spend plenty of Mommy and me / Daddy and me time
Converts from a crib to a toddler bed, daybed and full size bed with headboard & footboard (Daybed Rail included; Toddler Guardrail #0080 and Full Size Bed Rails #0050 sold separately)
This crib is JPMA certified to meet or exceed all safety standards set by the CPSC & ASTM; Tested for lead and other toxic elements to meet or exceed government and ASTM safety standards
body.description: Featuring a beautiful, understated sleigh silhouette, the Bentley 'S' Series 4-in-1 Crib from Delta Children delivers functionality and outstanding value for years to come. Made of solid hardwood, this multi-positional crib is built to handle anything your child throws its way and easily adapts to a cozy toddler bed, daybed and full size bed (Toddler Guardrail and Crib Conversion Rails sold separately).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Delta Children 7-Piece Essential Changing Table Set Revolve Reversible Stroller And Carriage/Pram Add-On Bundle, Cognac Delta Children Bentley Six Drawer Dresser Delta Children Avery Upholstered Glider Swivel Rocker Chair Delta Children Bentley Changing Table Shop Coordinating Items (sold separately) Create a cozy and organized place for your baby during diaper changes with this 7-Piece Essential Changing Table Set by Delta Children. The ultimate stroller and carriage bundle allows the Revolve Stroller to effortlessly grow with your little one A perfect complement to the Bentley S Series 4-in-1 Crib, this stylish dresser offers 6 spacious drawers for all your baby storage needs. Available in coordinating finishes. Retreat to the supreme comfort of this stylish glider chair as you relax with your little one. Available in complementary finishes. A perfect complement to the Bentley S Series 4-in-1 Crib, this stylish changing table offers a safe and secure place to change baby with ample storage. Available in White or Chocolate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, nice quality
reviews.reviewText: We got this crib for our woodland nursery. The dark cherry espresso wood is gorgeous. Overall the quality seems very good. Feels well built. My husband and I were able to easily assemble the crib together. There are some steps that may be a bit trickier for one person to accomplish on their own but it is doable. We are hopeful to be able to use this crib for years to come as we transition it to a toddler bed then full size bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2017
reviews.reviewText: I can not say enough good things about this crib! My husband & I researched cribs for months. My biggest concerns were shipping damage & buying a sturdy crib. We decided on this one because it's soooo beautiful & the reviews we saw were all saying that the crib was packaged well for shipping. Let me tell you, it was packaged VERY well. I was so nervous to open it because when it arrived, it had huge gashes in the box (I attached pictures). We were happy to find that it was all insulated in styrofoam & each item was wrapped. It had a tiny dent in it that ended up against the wall anyways. You risk dents & more even getting it from a store. We live in the middle of nowhere & the nearest large retail stores are almost 2 hours away so amazon seemed like the best bet for options. Assembly was a breeze. Took under 30 minutes for my husband to put it together. All I did was hold pieces up. This bed is VERY sturdy. We are very impressed & so excited to put our little one in it. For the other comments complaining about chemical smells, we did not experience this until we had the door closed to the room it was in for a few days. Once we opened the door, the smell went right away. The room doesn't have any windows & only has 1 vent for air flow so as long as you don't plan on closing off the room, you won't have any problems. It was closed due to the fact that I didn't want our cat to pee on the mattress before I got a sheet protector. Anyways, we could not be happier with this purchase. As a second time Mom, I love this crib so much more than my first one. Definitely worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, easy to assemble, beautifully made
reviews.reviewText: My husband put this crib together with ease. The packaging was very all organized and the directions were explained well too. Obviously you want to keep in mind that not all the holes will be used for the crib, as this is a 4-1 style. Husband used his drill to assemble and it probably took him 30-45min to assemble!I can understand why the smell of the crib would be bothersome to so many, but truthfully it's no different when you have furniture arrive from a retail store. Our baby is due in June, so I think with adequate planning, if you're sensitive to smell or that new furniture smell, if you buy ahead of time like we did then the smell should disappear in time. I also routine sage my home and have a defusser going daily.. if you're planning to get a humidifier, then get one that also acts as a defusser, and help with that chemical smell sooner rather than later.Overall, the appearance is everything I was hoping for. You can adjust the height of the crib so you're not bending over so low if that's a concern you have. It's very sturdy, husband approved that it's not flimsy by any means. My guests that I've had over cannot believe all my furniture in my nursery, I bought through amazon. And I got the crib, dresser, beautiful rocking chair(none of which look or were cheap!) Along with some other smaller items for 1k. You can't beat that if you're on a budget.I was worried how the delivery would be or if pieces would be damaged and thankfully, none were! I hope my little one loves it as much as I do!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Crib ever!
reviews.reviewText: I bought it in December 2021, is good quality and very good looking I received so many compliments

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this crib! It is so freaking cute! It is on the bigger end of cribs, so if you wants something smaller, it wouldn’t be the best choice. I love it, but my husband complained that it was crazy to put together. Haha He said it came in a million pieces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great solid wood crib for the price!
reviews.reviewText: Pros: Super cute. Solid wood. Really easy for an almost 9 month, high risk, pregnant woman to put together by herself (me!). The price is really nice too. Most solid wood cribs this quality would be $400 or more in store. See below for why it's 4/5.Cons: Put this together and one of the top railings (front and back are interchangeable) cracked as I screwed it together. The metal screw bracket inside the piece was the issue, it was not made correctly and was stripping the screws which caused the crack. Unscrewing it would cause the metal screw bracket to come out of the railing board.Customer Service: I reached out to their Customer Service to get just the one part replaced. I didn't want to have to disassemble the entire thing and put together an entire new crib. The front/back top railings are really easy to take on/off without taking anything else apart. They were really easy to work with and ordered a replacement part within a week of emailing them. They quoted 7-14 business days to receive the replacement, but we received it within 5 days. Unfortunately another one of the metal screw brackets in the replacement part was also stripping the screws. We knew better than to try to screw it in all the way this time, to avoid cracking the wood again. Fortunately my husband's father was able to fix the metal bracket piece, so we'll be able to just use that instead of going through Customer Service again. It was probably just unfortunate luck that we got two defective pieces. It wouldn't make me recommend this product any less to someone else, but I would just say be wary, if the screw isn't going in easily, don't force it, it's defective and will probably cause damage to the wood.
